body: Test of Appimage with all dependencies bundled in. Not yet fully usable.

name: v0.9.4.4
body:
Fixes, fixes and more fixes.

Fixes:
 - Creating `~/.config/autostart` with wrong permissions
 - Correctly terminating Syncthing Daemon when terminated by signal
 - Crash when adding new folder
 - Displaying folders multiple times in device editor
 - i3 detection
 - Cosmetic receive-only folder fixes
 - Windows: Bypassing proxy when connecting to Syncthing Daemon (thanks @TrueXakeP)
 - Broken icon in Abot dialog (thanks @TrueXakeP)
 - AppData improvements (thanks @jurf)
 - Translation updates

name: v0.9.4.3
body:
Changes:

- Fixed support for write-only folder :)

name: v0.9.4.2
body:
Changes:
- Added support for write-only folder.

Dependency changes:
- Requires Syncthing v0.14.50 or later

name: v0.9.4.1
body:
This release concerns Linux-related things, if you are on Windows, you can safely skip it.

--

Changes:
- Improved desktop notifications and added buttons for quick responses (thanks @bebehei)
- Improved display on small displays

Fixes:
- Fixes for better compatibility with NixOS
- Added missing dependencies to AppImage

name: v0.9.4
body:
Syncthing v0.14.47 and later supports filesystem monitoring by itself, so monitoring by Syncthing-GTK is no longer needed and got removed.

Your setting should be converted automatically when Syncthing-GTK starts up and you can configure monitoring done by Syncthing in same dialog as monitoring done by Syncthing-GTK before. In other words, it's change you shouldn't notice.

--

Changes:
- Warning message is displayed in terminal when status icon cannot be used
- Warning message is shown for Windows users when too-old system libraries are unable to download data from Github
- Added [`--nofinddaemon`](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/issues/427#issuecomment-393920392) option to setup.py
- Removed Autostart option on Gnome

Fixes:
- Replaced deprecated configuration values (thanks @AudriusButkevicius)
- Missing icons when starting from syncthing-gtk.py script.
- AppImage now includes everything...

Dependency changes:
- Requires **Syncthing v0.14.48 or later**
- syncthing-inotify is no longer bundled (nor needed) on Windows
- python-inotify is no longer needed

name: v0.9.3.1
body:
Mostly fixes.

- [AppImage](https://appimage.org/) now includes all but biggest dependencies (uses system-wide python and GTK)
- Updated translations from [Transifex](https://www.transifex.com/syncthing-gtk/), including partial translations to Italian and Dutch

Fixes:
- Connection error when HTTPS is enabled
- More connection problems on Windows
- And even more connection issues when folder has space in ID (thanks @TrueXakeP)
- Fallback for loading QR code when http gvfs backend is not available (thanks @pzskc383)
- Icon in about dialog not showing (thanks @City-busz)
- Bad wording in German translation (thanks @step21)

name: v0.9.3
body:
This version contains big, but very internal rewrite of how Syncthing-GTK talks to Syncthing. It should fix problems with random crashes, out-of-date folder states and UI breaking after laptop is resumed from sleep.

If you had no problems before, you shouldn't notice a thing.

Other changes:

- Added link to 'file downloaded' notification
- Added UI Settings to status icon menu
- Added support for AppImage

Fixes:
- Nautilus integration suddenly not working with latest nautilus versions
- Status icon being invisible (Thanks @City-busz)
- Symlinks not counted files

name: v0.9.2.7
body:
Windows fixes:
- Non-ascii characters in config file may crash 1st run wizard
- Missing library message when application starts
- Upgraded GTK to latest version

_This is Windows-only release. If you are on Linux, you can safely skip it_

name: v0.9.2.6
body:
Fixes:
- Cannot set dynamic and non-dynamic device address at once (thanks @Silvea12)

Windows:
- Fixed cx_Freeze error when autostarting on Windows 10 (#391)

name: v0.9.2.5
body:
Changes:
- Changed wording in notification for better clarity
- Added config-only option to disable status icon animation
- Added -o argument, dumps captured Syncthing daemon output to stdout
- Added argument to disable status icon (thanks @argv-minus-one)

Fixes:
- Filesystem watching fails on folder with space in id.
- 1st run wizard now stores password hash directly instead of leaving hashing to syncthing
- Switched to timeout_add_seconds for inotify polling (thanks @jgoerzen)

Localisation:
- Added Polish localisation (thanks to Damian Cypcar and m4sk1n)

Windows:
- Added registry configuration value for changing file browser

Notes:
- This release introduces **new dependency: python-bcrypt**

name: v0.9.2.4
body:
Update for small terminology change, "Master Folder" is "Send Only Folder" now.
- Updated locales
- Added Hungarian locales
- Fixed some typos

name: v0.9.2.3
body:
Windows Fixes:
- Opening synced directory in Windows Explorer (thanks @brad-burch)
- Added external, less crash-prone build of libgiognutls
- Portuguese language missing in language settings

Notes:
- This release is required for Syncthing daemon version 0.14.6 or newer. Older version of Syncthing-GTK will not connect to new Syncthing daemon.

name: v0.9.2.2
body:
New:
- Added Brazilian Portuguese translation (thanks to @robsonsobral)
- Support for folder labels in notifications (thanks to @acolomb)

Fixes:
- Not sending 'Host' header breaks Syncthing >=v0.14.6
- Crash on start with some Windows installations (thanks @Palatis)

Notes:
- This release is required for Syncthing daemon version 0.14.6 or newer. Older version of Syncthing-GTK will not connect to new Syncthing daemon.

name: v0.9.2.1
body:
This release fixes [crash-on-statup problem](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/issues/309) on Windows.

If you are on Linux, you can safely skip this release.

name: v0.9.2
body:
New:
- Added black and white icons theme, selectable in UI settings.
- Added Spanish translation (thanks to @buttle)
- New folder ID is pre-filled with auto-generated ID
- Added man page
- Added list of [both 5€ patrons](https://www.patreon.com/kozec) to About dialog.

Fixes:
- Error message about incompatible nodes is repeated infinitely
- File Pull Order defaults to nothing
- "Override remote changes" option not doing anything
- 'tcp://' is prepended to dynamic address in folder editor.
- Added more error details when '404/Not Found' error is generated.

Windows Fixes:
- Added Language selector to UI settings.
- Double-clicking on directory should open Windows Explorer (thanks to @brad-burch)

Notes:
- Requires daemon version 0.13 or newer, 0.14 is recommended.

name: v0.9.1
body:
New:
- **Compatible with Syncthing v0.14.0**
- Display notification when .sync-conflict file is created.
- Handle error message about outdated syncthing on remote device

Fixes:
- Renamed Chinese localisation directory

Windows:
- Updated Syncthing-inotify to version 0.8.3

Notes:
- Requires daemon version 0.13 or newer, 0.14 is recommended.

name: v0.9.0.3
body:
Windows:
- Don't move window out of the screen if number of displays is changed
- Bumped syncthing-inotify version

Fixes:
- Better cookie handling when no username nor API key is set
- About dialog updated with link to my Patreon page.

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.13 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.8.3](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.8.3).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Syncthing 0.13 is **not compatible** with the v0.12.x and it will **not connect nor synchronize files** with older versions. See [Syncthing release notes](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/releases/tag/v0.13.0) for more info.

name: v0.9.0.2
body:
More fixes:
- UI Settings crashing on small screen
- Daemon Settings crashing always

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.13 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.8.3](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.8.3).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Syncthing 0.13 is **not compatible** with the v0.12.x and it will **not connect nor synchronize files** with older versions. See [Syncthing release notes](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/releases/tag/v0.13.0) for more info.

name: v0.9.0.1
body:
Quick fix for left half of window missing.

For Syncthing 0.13 and above

Changes:
- Added support for folder labels
- Added support for Identification of Connections from Unknown Devices
- Added label that notifies user when changed setting needs ST-GTK restart
- Added 'File Pull Order' and 'Minimum Free Disk Space' fields to folder editor
- Changed formatting in speed limit fields
- Added Chinese, Russian and Lithuanian localization (thanks to @wsxy162, @midyukov-anton and @Moo)

Fixes:
- Fixed updater extracting systemd units.

Windows:
- GTK updated to 3.18, should fix disappearing border bug
- Updated Syncthing-inotify to version 0.7

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.13 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.8.3](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.8.3).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Syncthing 0.13 is **not compatible** with the v0.12.x and it will **not connect nor synchronize files** with older versions. See [Syncthing release notes](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/releases/tag/v0.13.0) for more info.

name: v0.9
body: _(never existed. Please, use [0.9.0.1](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.9.0.1))_

name: v0.8.3.3
body:
Prerelease to test with Syncthing v0.13 beta and to test locales.

See [Syncthing beta release notes](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/syncthing-v0-13-0-beta-2/7135) for all reasons why you shouldn't run this.

Changes since v0.8.3.2:
- Added Chinese, Russian and Lithuanian localization (thanks to @wsxy162, @midyukov-anton and @Moo)
- Fixed updater extracting systemd units.

name: v0.8.3.2
body:
Prerelease to test with Syncthing v0.13 beta.

See [Syncthing beta release notes](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/syncthing-v0-13-0-beta-2/7135) for all reasons why you shouldn't run this.

Changes since v0.8.3:
- Added support for folder labels
- Added support for Identification of Connections from Unknown Devices

Changes since v0.8.3.1:
- Added label that notifies user when changed setting needs ST-GTK restart
- Added 'File Pull Order' and 'Minimum Free Disk Space' fields to folder editor
- Changed formatting in speed limit fields
- Windows:
  - GTK updated to 3.18, should fix disappearing border bug
  - Updated Syncthing-inotify to version 0.7

name: v0.8.3.1
body:
Prerelease to test with Syncthing v0.13 beta.

See [Syncthing beta release notes](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/syncthing-v0-13-0-beta-2/7135) for all reasons why you shouldn't run this.

name: v0.8.3
body:
Added "Advanced" tab into UI Settings with options to change Syncthing daemon arguments and environment variables.

Fixes:
- Correct Syncthing config location on Windows XP (Thanks @singpolyma)
- Handling Syncthing restarting because of package upgrade on Debian
- Repository with space in ID not refreshing correctly.

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.8.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.8.2
body:
- Added French and Vietnamese localization (Thanks @Coeur-Noir and @dd721411)
- Added virtualenv support (#230, thanks @muelli)
- Added 'display daemon output' into notification icon menu

Fixes:
- About window not showing in some languages
- Support timestamps with GTM+0 or without timezone
- And two random, mostly harmless error messages (#229, 47fc164affade71cef3904af156d507b27b461c7)

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.8.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.8.1
body:
Added localization support with translations for Czech, German and Slovak languages.

Fixes:
- Syncthing version of remote node not shown
- Missing definition causing UI problems and Appreport madness on Ubuntu (thanks @Newman101)

Other:
- Added `--portable` parameter to syncthing-gtk.exe on Windows.
- Updated syncthing-inotify version to 0.6.7
- Added support for download placeholders in Nautilus plugin

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.12 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.7.6.1](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.7.6.1).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Syncthing 0.12 is **not compatible** with the v0.11.x and it will **not connect nor synchronize files** with older versions. See [Syncthing release notes](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/syncthing-v0-12-0-beryllium-bedbug/6026) for more info.

name: v0.8.0.1
body:
Linux-only release. If you are on Windows, please, use [v0.8](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.8)

Fixes:
- Syncthing version of remote node not shown
- Missing definition causing UI problems, inotify bugs and Appreport madness on Ubuntu (thanks @Newman101)

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.12 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.7.6.1](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.7.6.1).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Syncthing 0.12 is **not compatible** with the v0.11.x and it will **not connect nor synchronize files** with older versions. See [Syncthing release notes](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/syncthing-v0-12-0-beryllium-bedbug/6026) for more info.

Added localization support with translations for Czech, German and Slovak languages.

Fixes:
- Syncthing version of remote node not shown
- Missing definition causing UI problems and Appreport madness on Ubuntu (thanks @Newman101)

name: v0.8
body:
For Syncthing 0.12 and above

Additional fixes:
- No 'ignore' button on Unknown device message.
- Better support for non-ascii characters in user's home path on Windows

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.12 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.7.6.1](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.7.6.1).

- Syncthing 0.12 is **not compatible** with the v0.11.x and it will **not connect nor synchronize files** with older versions. See [Syncthing release notes](https://forum.syncthing.net/t/syncthing-v0-12-0-beryllium-bedbug/6026) for more info.

name: v0.7.6.2
body: _Prerelease to test with Syncthing v0.12. Most likely working._

name: v0.7.6.1
body:
Fixes:
- Typo in Windows installer description (thanks @DennisPS)
- Missing image definition causes crash with some GLib versions

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.6
body:
Fixes:
- window border disappearing (again) on Windows
- crash on too recent glib (#198)
- crash on too old glib (#201)
- inotify (filesystem watcher) not being aware of created directories
- Nautilus plugin ignoring some files until view is refreshed

**Note:** Standard Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.5.8
body: _Prerelease to test with Syncthing v0.12. Most likely broken._

name: v0.7.5.1
body:
_Quick fix for build script. If you are on v0.7.5, you can skip this release._

New:
- Better support for dark GTK themes ([from](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/930015/9033992/f3ff8686-39d4-11e5-91ef-b6689ca5ac8b.png) - [to](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1282500/9367149/ea80cffe-46bb-11e5-86dc-407835d460e6.png))

Fixes:
- showing stopped folders as "up-to-date"
- notification icon missing on i3

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.5
body:
New:
- Better support for dark GTK themes ([from](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/930015/9033992/f3ff8686-39d4-11e5-91ef-b6689ca5ac8b.png) - [to](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1282500/9367149/ea80cffe-46bb-11e5-86dc-407835d460e6.png))

Fixes:
- showing stopped folders as "up-to-date"
- notification icon missing on i3

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.4.1
body:
New:
- Added scrollbars around folder list and device list, fixing display on small screens

Fixes:
- starting `syncthing-gtk.py` from directory unicode characters in path
- moved filemanager emblems to where specification expects them
- invalid links and typos

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.4
body:
New stuff:
- displaying "(watch)" next to folder's rescan interval if filesystem watching is enabled
- added support for extenal and trashcan versioning
- added `--nostdownloader` argument to setup.py, for disabling Syncthing updater on "compile" time. (see [#170](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/issues/170#issuecomment-115352644))

Fixes:
- compatibility with non-GNU nice command (thanks @Somasis)
- filesystem watcher not reporting files with space in path
- crash on Windows with GTKHeader is enabled
- "browse" option not working with paths starting with ~ on Windows

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.3
body:
Fixes:
- IPv6 address cut out in 'Add new device' dialog (#166)
- Filesystem watcher broken in Linux
- Some icons missing when `syncthing-gtk.exe` is not started from it's own directory on Windows

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.2
body:
Windows-only stuff. If you are on Linux, you can skip this version.
- Fixed missing tray icon on some Windows machines
- Added _experimental_ support for filesystem watching on Windows using [syncthing-inotify](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-inotify).

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~12MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.7.2.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.1.2
body:
- added support for Exherbo's filesystem layout (thanks @Somasis)
- added support for small screens (#105)

Fixes:
- 1st run wizard crashing because of missing icon

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.11 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.6.5](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.6.5).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.1.1
body:
Quick fix for missing icons on Linux. On Windows, please use [v0.7.1](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.7.1)

---

Changes from v0.7.1:

Added support for themable and sizable icons, fixing weird cases when status icon is slightly larger than allocated area.

Other fixes:
- Quit option not working on latest XUbuntu
- Status icon not visible on Cinnamon
- Menu has no borders on Windows (#143)
- Fedora devs are crazy (#151)

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.11 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.6.5](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.6.5).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.1

name: v0.7.0.2
body:
Fixes updater trying to download most recent, but incompatible Syncthing version.

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.11 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.6.5](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.6.5).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7.0.1
body:
Fixes problem with nautilus (and other filemanagers) plugin.
If you are on Windows, you don't need this.

**Notes:**
- **Requires daemon version 0.11 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.6.5](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.6.5).
  If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.7
body:
**Requires daemon version 0.11 or newer.** For older daemon version, please use [v0.6.5](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/releases/tag/v0.6.5).
If you have _Keep Syncthing binary up-to-date_ option enabled, new daemon version will be downloaded upon first start.

Fixes:
- Reduced CPU usage thanks to new Syncthing API
- Added ability to download recent daemon version if current is no longer supported
- Really works under [Windows XP](http://i.imgur.com/1Gy2VDN.jpg), but Syncthing daemon has to be downloaded manually.

**Notes:**
- Standard Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6.9.2
body:
Prelease for testing with Syncthing v0.11.
**Don't touch unless you know what you are doing.**
- Another batch of fixes for API changes in Syncthing v0.11
- Using new  `FolderSummary` and  `FolderCompletion` events instead of pooling data
- -> reduced CPU ussage

**Requires daemon version 0.11.0-beta6 or newer**

name: v0.6.9.1
body:
Prelease for testing with Syncthing v0.11.
**Don't touch unless you know what you are doing.**

Fixes:
- Ability to download recent daemon version if current is no longer supported
- Missing icons with older GTK themes
- QR codes not displayed with HTTPS and/or password-protected daemon
- Crash on missing icons in GTK theme on KUbuntu (thanks @alexander255)
- _May_ work under XP

**Requires daemon version 0.11 (beta) or newer**

name: v0.6.9
body: _(nothing to see here)_

name: v0.6.5
body:
Last version working with Syncthing daemon version lower than v0.11
- Missing icons with older GTK themes
- QR codes not displayed with HTTPS and/or password-protected daemon
- Crash on missing icons in GTK theme on KUbuntu (thanks @alexander255)
- Reworderd 'Sure to remove something?' dialog to indicate that removing folder doesn't actually remove files
- _May_ work under XP

**Notes:**
- Standard Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6.4
body:
- Added option to set priority of daemon process
- Added check for certificate when HTTPS is used
- Added 'Unshared' state

**Notes:**
- Standard Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.6.4.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6.3
body:
New stuff:
- Partial support for Windows XP

Fixes:
- Filesystem watcher fixes
- Lowered CPU usage by decreasing number of API calls
- Support for configuration format changes in 0.10.26

**Notes:**
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6.2.1
body:
Pre-release. Digging graves on OS field...
- Partial support for Windows XP

Fixes:
- Catching rename events in file watcher
- Removing folders from file watcher without restarting ST-GTK
- Lower CPU usage decreasing number of `/rest/completion` calls
- Support for configuration format changes in 0.10.26

**Notes:**
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6.2
body:
Fixes:
- Better notification icon compatibility on KDE4/5 (thanks @alexander255)
- Fixed restarting daemon and blocking Windows shutdown
- Saving log to file on Windows
- Even more unicode-related fixes in file watcher

**Notes:**
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6.1
body:
Useful stuff:
- Better Master Folder support ([more info](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/issues/86#issuecomment-73677975))
  - Added 'Cluster out of sync' status when cluster content differs from master folder
  - Added 'Override Changes' option to context menu

Fixes:
- Problems with Unicode paths in editor dialog and file watcher
- Missing icons with GTK header and Windows
- Traffic info overflows in on 32bit OS
- Support for filemanager integration onUbuntu
- Traditional notification icon not supported on KDE5
- Invalid QR code displayed on Windows

**Notes:**
- File manager integration requires _python-nautilus_, _python-nemo_ or _python-caja_ package.
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.6
body:
New stuff:
- Support for [Identicons](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/issues/735)
- Option to display folder IDs instead of paths on left-side panel
- File manager integration for Nautilus, Nemo and Caja. Includes emblems and context menus

Fixes:
- Missing Gnome AppMenu
- Event pooling crashes when daemon sends invalid date
- Multiple bugs with unicode paths (thanks @t184256)

**Notes:**
- Requires daemon **version 0.10.9 or newer**
- File manager integration requires _python-nautilus_, _python-nemo_ or _python-caja_ package.
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.9
body:
**_Pre-release for package testing. Most likely broken**_

New stuff:
- Support for Identicons
- Option to display folder IDs instead of paths as tiles for folder boxes
- Filemanager integration for Nautilus, Nemo and Caja. Includes emblems and context menus

Fixes:
- Missing Gnome AppMenu
- Event pooling crashes when daemon sends invalid date

name: v0.5.8
body:
- Allowed disabling menu icons when HeaderBar is disabled
- Allowed setting rescan interval to zero

Fixes:
- Both menus are same with HeaderBar and menu icons enabled
- Several menu icons are missing on Ubuntu 14.04 (#68)

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.7.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.7
body:
- Added -m option to start minimized
- Changed names for repository states to same as Syncthing uses
- Added compatibility for GTK 3.8 (Ubuntu 13.10)

Fixes:
- Local daemon version not shown
- Mangled "Daemon not found" message in 1st run wizard

Windows:
- Connect to localhost if daemon is configured to listen on all interfaces
- GTK updated to 3.14.0_rev6

**Note:** Standard Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.7.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.6
body:
Fixes:
- Download and upload rates calculated wrong on Syncthing v0.10.9 or newer.

**Notes:**
- Requires daemon **version 0.10.9 or newer**
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.5
body:
Bugfix release.
- Fix for app.glade (and rest of glade files) being not found (#53)
- Fix for missing Gtk.Application methods on Ubuntu (#51)

**Notes:**
- If you are running v0.5.4 on Windows, this release is basically the same and you can safely skip it.
- Due to [bug in older Syncthing daemon](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/issues/49#issuecomment-66884575), 1st run wizard requires daemon **version 0.10.3 or newer**
- Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.4
body:
Fixes:
- Error handling in 1st run wizard
- Set minimal window size, so window can't be shrink so much that it's not possible to access one of panels anymore
- Redone logging and argument parsing

Windows:
- Added 'Start Syncthing-GTK' option to installer
- Allow (un)installer to close Syncthing-GTK and prevent it from leaving files behind
- Don't leave zombie trayicon when exiting

\+ some typos and cosmetic fixes.

**Note:** Due to [bug in older Syncthing daemon](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-gtk/issues/49#issuecomment-66884575), 1st run wizard requires daemon **version 0.10.3 or newer**

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.3
body:
Cosmetics:
- Use gray icon when no remote device is connected
- Display directory with gray color and "Offline" state when there is no assigned device connected

Fixes:
- Automatically create ~/.config/autostart, if needed
- Improved logging

**Note:** Windows installer will download ~11MB [package with required libraries](http://kozec.com/syncthing-gtk-windows-libraries-0.5.3.zip) during first installation.

name: v0.5.2
body:
- Updated URL for Syncthing updater
- Support for Syncthing >=0.10.9

Cosmetics:
- Automaticaly open topmost repo/device boxes when starting

Fixes:
- Anonymous usage reporting correctly stored, but incorrectly represented in UI
- Bugged icon in Windows installer

name: v0.5.1
body: New: - Updated icons to new Syncthing icon theme - Added 'Anonymous usage reporting' popup, so user can accept it even if he never opens WebUI - HTTPS support (Linux only) Cosmetics: - Removed 'quit' button from "Syncthing is restarting" message - Corrected a lot of typos Windows fixes: - Window border should no longer disappear randomly - Rate limiting tray menus actually changes transfer rates - Closed socket is no longer treated as fatal connection error, as Windows likes to do that a lot Note: Windows installer will download ~11MB package with required libraries during first installation.

name: v0.5
body:
Important stuff:
- Windows support + Windows installer
- Better Gnome support
- First run wizard
- Doesn't need syncthing to be started at least once anymore

New:
- Autoupdater for daemon binary (enabled by default only on Windows)
- Stop / Resume syncthing items in notification icon menu
- Speed throttling options in notification icon menu
- Option to automaticaly start Syncthing-GTK with desktop session
- Option to set path to daemon binary

Fixes:
- Removed own name from 'Shared with' device list

Cosmetics:
- Return of paned handle margin that suddenly disappeared in GTK 3.14
- Better support for dark GTK themes

name: v0.4.2.4
body: Note: Still pre-release, still may be somehow broken. Release is mainly intended for testing new 1st run wizard and Windows port. New stuff: - Stop / Resume syncthing items in notification icon menu - Speed throttling options in notification icon menu - Option to automaticaly start Syncthing-GTK with desktop session - _Windows:_ Option to select installation directory in installer Fixes: - Remove own name from 'Shared with' device list - _Windows:_ Don't expect syncthing in /usr/bin - _Windows:_ Remember window position - _Windows:_ Always kill daemon if started as background process Note: Windows installer will download ~11MB package with required libraries during first installation.

name: v0.4.2.3
body: Note: This is pre-release mainly for testing new 1st run wizard and Windows port. Its almost sure that something is broken. - Cosmetic fixes: - Get back paned handle margin that suddenly disappeared in GTK 3.14 - Better support for dark GTK themes - First Run Wizard than can find daemon binary and create Syncthing configuration. - Windows support Note: Standard Windows installer will download ~11MB package with required libraries during first installation. Full installer has this package bundled.

name: v0.4.2.1
body: Fixes for GTK3.10 on Fedora. If you are running v0.4.2, you can safely skip this.

name: v0.4.2
body: - Desktop notification fixes Requires daemon version 0.10 or newer. For older daemon version, please use v0.3.8

name: v0.4.1
body: - Added desktop notifications for file updates and Syncthing errors - Added highlighting for related folder/devices in main window - Some fixes Requires daemon version 0.10 or newer. For older daemon version, please use v0.3.8

name: v0.4
body: - Added support for inotify filesystem watching, enabling changed files to be synchronized immediately. - Added UI Settings Dialog with options to disable hiding window on startup and non-native looking window header. - Added error message that popups when daemon version is too old - Support for REST API changes and changed node/repo-related terminology in syncthing v0.10 Requires daemon version 0.10 or newer. For older daemon version, please use v0.3.8

name: v0.3.8.1
body:
Last version working with Syncthing daemon version lower than v0.10

Bugfixes:
- Don't display just added repo with 'unknown' state
- Display "Always start daemon automaticaly" even if app starts minimized
- Check daemon version and exit with message if daemon is too old

name: v0.3.8
body: - Support for setting 'Introducer' nodes and ignore patterns editing, new in syncthing v0.9.18

name: v0.3.7
body: - Support for REST API changes in syncthing v0.9.18 - Added support for displaying 'last seen' value

name: v0.3.6
body:
- Changed icon on 'edit' button to cogwheel
- Added 'Share Repositories' block to node editor, allowing user to set all repositories shared with edited node in one place
- Increased event pooling interval when main window is hidden to save some CPU power
- Some (mostly cosmetic) fixes

name: v0.3.5
body:
- Added 'Browse' option to repo popup menu
- Fixed unsupported events spamming log/console

name: v0.3.4
body: - Fix for daemon settings dialog crashing - Option to add remote node that is trying to connect and it's not in local node list yet. Requires daemon version 0.9.8 or newer. For older daemon version, use v0.3.2.

name: v0.3.3
body: - Added 'Rescan Interval' display and field to repository editor (new in Syncthing 0.9.6) - Added 'Staggered versioning' support to repository editor (new in Syncthing 0.9.8) Requires daemon version 0.9.8 or newer. For older daemon version, use v0.3.2.

name: v0.3.2
body:
Last version working with Syncthing daemon version lower than 0.9.8
- Fix for settings dialog staying on screen after settings are saved

name: v0.3.1
body:
- Added 'rescan' menu option for repo context menu - added in syncthing 0.9.5
- Fix for same error message displaying multiple times

name: v0.3
body:
- Added 'delete' to all (two) context menus
- Added support for password-protected daemon (uses API key)

name: v0.2.1
body: Small bugfix.

name: v0.2
body:
- Added option to auto-fix 'Unexpected repository ID sent from node' error
- Option to start Syncthing daemon as subprocess

name: v0.1.1
body: - Ubuntu fixes
